about.para1: As a passionate web developer and current student, I am driven by a desire to learn, create, and innovate. My love for programming began in high school, and since then, I have been dedicated to honing my skills and expanding my knowledge.
about.para2: With a strong foundation in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node js, and MongoDB, I am well-equipped to develop dynamic and responsive websites that engage users and meet their needs. I am also proficient in popular frameworks such as React and Bootstrap, and I am constantly exploring new technologies to stay ahead of the curve.
about.para3: In addition to my technical skills, I bring a creative and collaborative mindset to every project I undertake. I enjoy working with teams and will also love to work with clients to understand their goals and visions, and I strive to bring those visions to life through my coding.
about.para4: As I continue my studies, I am eager to gain more hands-on experience through internships and freelance projects. I am excited to contribute my skills and enthusiasm to any organization that values innovation, teamwork, and a commitment to excellence.

learnings: Developed strong research and critical analysis skills
Collaborated effectively in team-based projects and assignments
